author: jhgoh
body:
The common isolation framework (CITK) and Versioned-ID (VID) are applied to muons.
Simple wrapper to the Muon POG standard ID selectors are added with working initial configuration files.
No change to standard RECO is expected since it is designed to run on AOD or MiniAOD.

This PR supersedes previous attempt #9273.
Some safeguards are also included which are suggested by @cvuosalo in the previous PR.
title: Muon Common Isolation Framework and Versionned ID
